# Child Care Management Software

## Built for Speed & Growth

Experience the next generation of Jackrabbit Care software that will
streamline processes and provide flexibility that owners, managers and staff
require to grow their business. Check out Jackrabbit Care’s latest
enhancements and partner with a team who cares.

Schedule a Demo

# Child Care Management Software

## Built for Speed & Growth

Get ready to experience the next generation of Jackrabbit Care software that
will streamline processes and provide flexibility that owners, managers and
staff require to grow their business. Check out the latest enhancements and
learn what is coming up next.

Schedule a Demo

## Grow Your Child Care Center with Jackrabbit

### Tuition & Billing

Customizable billing profiles, automated tuition posting and billing coupled
with simple, easy-to-understand statements.

### Center Management

Owner, Director and Parent-Approved features that unlock your center’s
operations and allow you to grow faster.

### Student Health & Safety

Track real-time ratios, immunizations, allergies and more. Jackrabbit keeps
you, your students and center safe and secure.

## Jackrabbit is Proud to Serve Over 7,000 Clients Around the World

Since 2004, Jackrabbit has served thousands of owners, directors,
administrators, and parents.

Read Our Story

## Award-Winning Center Management Software

## Intuitive Child Care Software that Unlocks Your Center's Growth Potential

### Automated Processes Built by You

Your business is unique. Choose a management software tool that understands
how you operate. Jackrabbit Care offers a customizable solution that meets you
where you are and enables you to grow at any pace.

### Reliable, Fast and Secure

Jackrabbit Care offers owners and directors fast, secure and reliable
information on their center, students and parents in seconds.

See for yourself

## Stay In the Know

### Keep up-to-date on what's trending in the child care industry with new
Jackrabbit blogs, webinars, event announcements, and more. Subscribe today for
our monthly newsletter!
